checkoutTermsAndConditions:
Unopened products may be returned within one month of purchase for credit at Deep Blue Med Spa locations. Deep Blue Med Spa treatment packages and garments are
non-refundable. 

Reward points have no cash value and may not be transferred or combined. If you are not an appropriate candidate for a procedure you have purchased, the purchase amount may be applied towards another procedure or products that are available on our store.

mainMenuCategories.name: Shop By Skin Type or Condition

businessInfo.verbiageForShipmentConfirmationForTreatm:
Thank you for your order from Deep Blue Med Spa's online store. If you requested a pickup, you will be notified when your order is ready for pickup. If you ordered an in-office procedure, please call our office at 516-665-1922 to schedule your appointment. 

LINK FOR APPT REQUEST: https://www.deepbluemedspa.com/contact-us/
